user.title: Connect to Emby
user.description:
Enter your Emby Server connection details.

You can find your **API Key** in your Emby Server Dashboard under **Advanced > API Keys**.

data_description.host: The IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.5) or hostname of your server.
data_description.api_key: A dedicated API key created in your Emby Dashboard.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Emby Server. Check your IP and Port.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API Key. Please verify the key in your Emby Dashboard.

abort.already_configured: This Emby server is already configured.
